name: Concerto
tagline: Concerto is the IBM Blockchain Solution Framework: a library of assets/functions for quickly creating blockchain-based applications.
body: -------------------- ### Table of Contents 1. [Getting Started with Concerto](#getting-started) 2. [Concerto Architecture and GitHub README](#github-readme) 3. [Contributing to Concerto](#contributing-concerto) 4. [System Testing](#system-testing) 5. [Javascript Docs & UML Model Diagrams](#concerto-jsdoc) -------------------- #### 1. **Getting Started with Concerto** See the [**Getting Started guide**](getting-started.html) section for more information. #### 2. **Concerto Architecture & Github README** [**The Concerto README**](README.html) on [**Github**](../Concerto) provides an overview on how to use the Concerto Framework components, its language and architectural components. #### 3. **Contributing to Concerto** [**Contributing to Concerto**](CONTRIBUTING.html) describes how to get started with the Concerto library / repository. #### 4. **System Testing** [**System Testing**](System-Testing.html) describes system testing with Concerto framework and the Hyperledger Fabric.5 #### 5. **Javascript Docs & UML Model Diagrams** [**JS Docs and UML Models**](../Concerto/jsdoc/develop) provides Javascript Docs and UML model diagrams describing Concerto classes and usage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
